attributes.action: Look at the percentage of duty paid on fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Does the government think that we believe there spin that fuel prices are high due to green issues. this is
not believed by the public the higher the price of oil the more duty they collect.This is another government con.
We think that the government should fix the amount of duty to 50 pence rather than the percentage rate.
If they where honest they would tell
us they love the oil price being high.
When the oil companies are making record profits how much money is the 
government making. They dont want us  using green energy because this would
cost them revenue.If they wanted to they could put the extra revenue into providing a good grant system so that everyone could afford to have it installed. But remember solar power and wind power doesnt create revenue.
So please stop using the excuse that fuel duty is high for green reasons.
Fix the percentage rate now or give the
extra money to provideing solar or wind power free to everyone.
                     John Meritt

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
